Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Aberdeen
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Aberdeen, 101st, Halsted & 103rd, due to fire department activity near 103rd/Aberdeen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Aberdeen, 101st, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 103rd, due to fire department activity near 103rd/Aberdeen.

Allow extra travel time.
